channel.title: All 562's have no ip input section!
channel.description:
I checked in like 5 different 562, 614, and 602 clients, but I can't find where to put my IP, legitpks.no-ip.biz (My no-ip)!
I checked client.java and i searched the following, "serverip, server ip, and server =" I have found no traces of such things, usually it says, "server = "the ip" "
Someone help me, no one can freaking tell me where i put the IP....you all have made like 10 562 servers and you can code, i can't code so could someone help me with this.
My question is: Where do I input the IP into my 562 server, or how. :( :confused:
